data.name: ∀stralbringer -Shaded Arkarium-
data.detailed_description:
Features

This is a high difficulty 2D bullet-hell sci-fi action shooting game in which the player controls his/her ship with the mouse.
In this title, in addition to shooting game-like shot attacks
You can use a number of unique "methods (special moves)" to destroy your enemies.

In this work, the user has the freedom to control their own aircraft with the mouse and the intuitive choice of attacks with multiple buttons.
It provides more freedom in high-speed combat by removing the fetters of cross keys, levers, speed limitations, and the choice of attack methods by items.

Method Introduction

In preparation...

Story

-Shaded Arkarium-
In the past, a world on the brink of unprecedented crisis due to an all-out war.
The world's destruction was averted by the sudden appearance of a being called the "Eternity".
In a world where air and soil pollution has worsened, the "Eternity" develops and builds a huge isolation platform called the "Arkarium" in order to escape from the critical situation in which they are living.
Under the control of the "Eternity," people are living happily in the "Arkarium".

∀stralbringer
In preparation...

Characters

Ai (Player character)
A self-proclaimed well-mannered civilian lives in Arkarium.
She thought she had been living an earnest life while cutting corners moderately, but in a strange turn of events, she died in an accident.
With Maya's help, she gains a temporary life, but next she is hunted by "Eternity".
What the heck?

Maya
A mysterious entity that ran over and killed Ai and brought him back to life.
She said that has lost her body and is unable to perform to her original specifications.
Maya is helping Ai to regain their bodies while compensating for the loss of Ai's body.
She is a musclebrain, thinks about everything after beats everything.
